If \\( h(z) \\) is applied initially to a vector \\( z_0 \\) at t = 0, will \\( z(t) \\) at t = T be unaffected by \\( h(z) \\)?

This changes the trajectory of the system from what would have been observed if only \\(\\dot{z} = Mz + N\\) were allowed to act on \\( z_0 \\).
